tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: i met with an accident and had to undergo ACL reconstruction and Dr Venugopal sir was the best in the field. he first gave me a confidence about the surgery and the recovery. he explained what exactly is needed step by step. post surgery care I was walking within 2 days after surgery. one of the best doctor. thank you sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I know the doctor from last 17years and I have been consulting him for any orthopaedic related problems. He diagnosise the problem patiently and provides realistic treatment, avoids unnecessary tests and therapies. He is a trust worthy doctor. He treats patients with care and respect.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor was amazing. He clearly listened to my problem and was very patient enough to explain me the cause of my problem. There was no wait time and also he had visited my profile before I enter that means he also does his homework before the session. The time spent in his room was worth while no wastage of my time nor his time. 
I would very much suggest him to my friends and family.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Doctor suggested a few remedies without explaining the cause of pain or the rationale behind the advised treatment. 

Also for a joint pain atleast a quick touch to understand the point of pain and thus the affected system would have been ideal. It appears as though the remedies were suggested via guesstimating.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: firstly I wish to thank the doc for helping my twin brother to recover completly from a bone fracture..which i spent my time's on different doc's for almost an year finally he is normal :) he is a good person so the good things and  comments or coming on his way..

tags: None
review: Excellent analysis and very clear explanation and instructions for treatment, prescribes the right approach for therapy.

tags: None
review:
Doctor was good and kind. 

Staff were rude. They didn’t agree on rate shown in Practo App. Also asked for additional registration fee

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is very experienced which shows in his speed and the very specific questions he asks. He is honest and prepares us for likely costs while giving quick relief options also to begin with.

tags: None
review: The doctor wasn't available and cleaning nic was closed. Nobody answered the call. Pathetic service and behaviour . And now I am being asked to write atleast 92 letters
